actionCalls.description: Case creation notification to helpdesk queue members
actionCalls.name: notification_to_helpdesk_queue_members
actionCalls.label: notification to helpdesk queue members

decisions.name: Assign_Record_Type_Based_On_Business_Unit
decisions.label: Assign Record Type Based On Business Unit

formulas.name: Condition
formulas.expression: IF( {!BU_BS_ST_Fields.bottomValue} == "Access & License Management" && {!Access_type} == "New User" && ( {!User_Type} == "System Admin (Non Business User)" || {!User_Type} == "Non-System Admin (Business User)"), TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: Condition1
formulas.expression: IF( {!BU_BS_ST_Fields.bottomValue} == "Access & License Management" && ({!Access_type} == "Existing User Deactivation" || {!Access_type} == "Existing User Activation"), TRUE, FALSE)

recordLookups.name: Get_User_Data_of_Reference_User
recordLookups.label: Get User Data of Reference User

fields.name: ComminityError
fields.fieldText: Please choose "Access & License Management" if you wish to submit a case for the creation or deactivation of a new portal/community user.

fields.name: UserCommunityMsg
fields.fieldText: Please fill "Community User Management Template" available under Quick Links and upload it to this Case in the next screen.

fields.name: CaseCreated
fields.fieldText:
Your HelpDesk case is created. Please check your email box for case details!!


Navigate to helpdesk case record : {!Get_Helpdesk_Case_Created_Record.CaseNumber}

defaultValue.stringValue: (GMT+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Brussels, Copenhagen, Madrid, Paris

variables.description: Stores the ID case requestor the flow
variables.name: userId
